GraphQL query warpper Block (gutenberg)

Products list

query posts(
	$post_type: String! = "product",
	$limit: Int = 12,
	$page: Int = 0,
	$term_slug: [String] = []
) {
	nq:search( 
		post_type: $post_type, 
		limit: $limit, 
		skip: $page,
		terms: $term_slug
	) {
		id: ID
		post_title
		post_name
		categories
		thumbnail
		post_meta
	}
}

Products categories list

query Categories(
	$name: String = "product_cat"
) {
	nq: categories(
		name: $name
	) {
    	name
    	slug
	}
}

Single product

query posts(
	$post_name: String
) {
	nq: queryPost(
		post_name: $post_name,
		parent:0
	) {
		id:ID
		post_title
		post_content
		post_name
		categories
		thumbnail
		post_meta(
			fields: [
				_price, 
				_crosssell_ids, 
				_product_image_gallery,
				_product_attributes
			]
		)
	}
}
